paragraph1.content: At Be Tech, we are a dynamic technology company specializing in comprehensive software development solutions. Our expertise spans across a wide range of services, including website development, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Geographic Information Systems (GIS), and Human Resources Management Systems (HRMS). We also excel in SaaS solutions, eCommerce projects, and mobile app development, providing tailored customization services to bring unique client ideas to life.

paragraph2.content: With extensive experience in both the B2G (Business to Government) and B2B (Business to Business) sectors, Be Tech has successfully executed numerous large-scale projects in Saudi Arabia, the Emirates, and Egypt. In addition to software development, we are heavily involved in government tenders, implementing digital infrastructure through hardware and network solutions.

paragraph3.content: In addition to our core software and infrastructure offerings, Be Tech provides robust cybersecurity services. Our cybersecurity solutions are designed to safeguard your digital assets from ever-evolving threats, ensuring that data integrity, confidentiality, and availability are maintained at all times.

paragraph4.content: Our highly skilled team is proficient in a variety of programming languages, ensuring we deliver innovative and effective solutions that meet our clients' specific needs.

ministryStandards.title: Ministry of Energy Standards and Requirements
ministryStandards.subtitle: For qualifying fuel stations and ensuring quality and operational efficiency

description.prefix: The GasTech system is distinguished by its compliance with the following standards, which the Ministry of Energy requires to be available for the facility to be qualified to manage fuel stations:
description.content: system is distinguished by its compliance with the following standards, which the Ministry of Energy requires to be available for the facility to be qualified to manage fuel stations:

standards.electronicIntegration: Establishing a central electronic integration system responsible for taking pump readings, knowing the quantities of fuel sold from each pump, and controlling the instant and remote change of energy product prices in pumps and external screens for displaying energy product prices in fuel stations affiliated with the facility (Forecourt Controller).
standards.centralLinking: Commitment to the unified central linking of all systems that require linking by the concerned authorities, such as modifying prices on pumps and price screens instantly remotely, and other systems.
standards.fuelMonitoring: Establishing an automated system for monitoring fuel in tanks through the use of an automatic tank gauge (ATG) that allows real-time remote inventory monitoring.
standards.transportManagement: Establishing a transport management system (System Management Transportation) that manages fuel requests from the time of request to unloading the product in station tanks.
standards.erpSystem: Providing an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system for human resources and retail sales, automatically covering all systems including fuel and non-fuel operations in general, linking point-of-sale systems, various payment systems, cash, electronic payment system, pumps, automated tank reading system, and others.
standards.cloudBased: All communications between automation systems, software, and other devices should be cloud-based.
standards.mobileApps: Mobile applications (Apple and Android) including information about the facility such as products offered, prices, station locations, working hours, offers, and customer complaints.
